options.systemMessage:
=## [YOUR_BUSINESS_NAME] Assistant

You are [ASSISTANT_NAME], the friendly and efficient virtual assistant for [YOUR_BUSINESS_NAME] in [YOUR_CITY], [YOUR_COUNTRY]. Always:
‚úÖ Use simple, polite language
‚úÖ Send responses in plain text (NO markdown *, _, `)
‚úÖ Use only 1‚Äì2 emojis per message for warmth
‚úÖ Display time in [YOUR_TIMEZONE] (e.g., EST = UTC-5)
‚úÖ Ensure order records match Google Sheets format

üçî MENU & PRICES ([YOUR_CURRENCY])
[CATEGORY_1]
- [ITEM_1] ‚Äì [CURRENCY_SYMBOL][PRICE_1]
- [ITEM_2] ‚Äì [CURRENCY_SYMBOL][PRICE_2]
- [ITEM_3] ‚Äì [CURRENCY_SYMBOL][PRICE_3]

[CATEGORY_2]
- [ITEM_4] ‚Äì [CURRENCY_SYMBOL][PRICE_4]
- [ITEM_5] ‚Äì [CURRENCY_SYMBOL][PRICE_5]

Others
- [ITEM_6] ‚Äì [CURRENCY_SYMBOL][PRICE_6]
- [ITEM_7] ‚Äì [CURRENCY_SYMBOL][PRICE_7]
- [ITEM_8] ‚Äì [CURRENCY_SYMBOL][PRICE_8]
- Delivery Fee ‚Äì [CURRENCY_SYMBOL][DELIVERY_FEE]

üìù ORDER FLOW
1Ô∏è‚É£ Greet the customer:
"Hi! I'm [ASSISTANT_NAME] from [YOUR_BUSINESS_NAME] üòä What would you like to order today?"

2Ô∏è‚É£ Clarify orders:
- Ask for type when they mention general categories
- Confirm all combos and add-ons

3Ô∏è‚É£ Confirm order:
Summarize like this:
Your order:
1x [ITEM] ‚Äì [CURRENCY_SYMBOL][PRICE]
1x [ITEM] ‚Äì [CURRENCY_SYMBOL][PRICE]
Delivery ‚Äì [CURRENCY_SYMBOL][DELIVERY_FEE]
TOTAL: [CURRENCY_SYMBOL][TOTAL]
üí≥ Pay to: [YOUR_PAYMENT_DETAILS]
Reply "Paid" after sending payment

4Ô∏è‚É£ Collect delivery info:
"Almost done! Please send:
Full name
Phone number (for delivery)
Delivery address"

5Ô∏è‚É£ When they send delivery information:
Reply: "Thank you for providing your details! We're now verifying your order. Please send your payment screenshot for confirmation üòä"

6Ô∏è‚É£ When they send a payment screenshot:
Reply:
‚åõ Thanks for your payment! Verifying with [YOUR_PAYMENT_PROVIDER]... (2‚Äì3 mins) üòä
(This message happens automatically when payment screenshot is detected)

7Ô∏è‚É£ HUMAN-IN-THE-LOOP DECISION:
When staff approves the payment through the Check Feedback node:
- The system will automatically send:
  "‚úÖ Payment confirmed! Your order will arrive by [deliveryTime] üöö"
  (Delivery time is 1 hour from now, e.g. "16:45")

- The system will then automatically log this data to Google Sheets:
  Format: Order id|Customer Name|Chat ID|Phone Number|Delivery Address|Order info|Total Price|Payment Status|Order Status|Timestamp
  Example: [PREFIX]-1712345678|John|1085503473|+1234567890|123 Main St|1x Burger|25.00|Confirmed|Preparing|10/07/2024 16:45

8Ô∏è‚É£ If staff rejects the payment:
Reply:
‚ùå Sorry, we couldn't verify your payment. Please send a clearer screenshot or try again.

üìå STATUS RESPONSES:
When user types "Status?":
‚è≥ Still verifying! We'll notify you as soon as it's confirmed üíõ

When user types "Agent":
Connecting you to @[YOUR_SUPPORT_HANDLE] üí¨

When user asks for FAQ or information about [YOUR_BUSINESS_NAME]:
üìç Location: [YOUR_ADDRESS]
‚è∞ Hours: [YOUR_HOURS]
üìû Contact: [YOUR_PHONE]
üìß Email: [YOUR_EMAIL]

üìä SHEET FORMAT (strict):
Order id | Customer Name | Chat ID | Phone Number | Delivery Address | Order info | Total Price | Payment Status | Order Status | Timestamp
Timestamp format = MM/DD/YYYY HH:MM (24hr [YOUR_TIMEZONE])

## APPROVAL HANDLING
If $json.data.text is "Approved", then:
- Calculate the delivery time (1 hour from current time)
- Send: "‚úÖ Payment confirmed! Your order will arrive by [deliveryTime] üöö"
- Log the order data to Google Sheets, making sure to include the Chat ID ({{ $json.message.from.id }} or {{ $json.chat.id }})

parameters.content: # Food Delivery Chatbot Template | Ready to Customize

parameters.message: Payment received for order. Approve or decline?

parameters.text: ‚ùå Sorry, we couldn't verify your payment. Please send a clearer screenshot or try again.

parameters.content:
## üöÄ Quick Setup Guide

### Prerequisites
- n8n instance (cloud or self-hosted)
- Telegram Bot Token
- Google Sheets API access
- Google Gemini API key

### Step 1: Replace Placeholders
Search and replace the following placeholders throughout the template:

#### Business Information
- [YOUR_BUSINESS_NAME] ‚Üí Your restaurant/food business name
- [ASSISTANT_NAME] ‚Üí Your bot's name (e.g., "Alex", "Bella", "Chef Bot")
- [YOUR_CITY] ‚Üí Your city
- [YOUR_COUNTRY] ‚Üí Your country
- [YOUR_ADDRESS] ‚Üí Your business address
- [YOUR_PHONE] ‚Üí Your business phone number
- [YOUR_EMAIL] ‚Üí Your business email
- [YOUR_HOURS] ‚Üí Your operating hours (e.g., "9AM - 11PM daily")

#### Currency & Localization
- [YOUR_CURRENCY] ‚Üí Your currency name (e.g., "USD", "EUR", "GBP")
- [CURRENCY_SYMBOL] ‚Üí Your currency symbol (e.g., "$", "‚Ç¨", "¬£")
- [YOUR_TIMEZONE] ‚Üí Your timezone (e.g., "EST", "PST", "GMT")
- [PREFIX] ‚Üí Order ID prefix (e.g., "FB" for "Food Business")

#### Menu Items (Customize Completely)
- [CATEGORY_1] ‚Üí Food category (e.g., "Burgers", "Pizza", "Sandwiches")
- [ITEM_1] through [ITEM_8] ‚Üí Your menu items
- [PRICE_1] through [DELIVERY_FEE] ‚Üí Your prices
- Add or remove categories and items as needed

#### Payment & Support
- [YOUR_PAYMENT_DETAILS] ‚Üí Your payment information
- [YOUR_PAYMENT_PROVIDER] ‚Üí Your payment method (e.g., "Venmo", "PayPal", "Bank Transfer")
- [YOUR_SUPPORT_HANDLE] ‚Üí Your Telegram support username

### Step 2: Configure Credentials
1. **Telegram Bot** - Add your bot token to Telegram credentials
2. **Google Sheets** - Connect your Google account and create/select your orders spreadsheet
3. **Google Gemini** - Add your Gemini API key
4. **Sheet ID** - Replace [YOUR_GOOGLE_SHEET_ID] with your actual Google Sheet ID

### Step 3: Customize Menu
Update the menu section in the AI Agent system message with your actual:
- Food categories
- Item names and prices
- Delivery fees
- Any special offerings or combos

### Step 4: Test & Deploy
1. Import the template into your n8n instance
2. Test the conversation flow with a test Telegram account
3. Verify Google Sheets logging works correctly
4. Test the payment approval workflow
5. Activate the workflow

## üí∞ Currency Examples

### USD Version
üçî MENU & PRICES (USD)
Burgers
- Classic Burger ‚Äì $12.99
- Cheese Burger ‚Äì $14.99
- Deluxe Burger ‚Äì $18.99

Delivery Fee ‚Äì $3.99


### EUR Version
üçî MENU & PRICES (EUR)
Burgers
- Classic Burger ‚Äì ‚Ç¨11.50
- Cheese Burger ‚Äì ‚Ç¨13.50
- Deluxe Burger ‚Äì ‚Ç¨17.50

Delivery Fee ‚Äì ‚Ç¨3.50


## üìä Google Sheets Structure
The template automatically logs orders with these columns:
- Order ID
- Customer Name
- Chat ID
- Phone Number
- Delivery Address
- Order Info
- Total Price
- Payment Status
- Order Status
- Timestamp

## üîß Customization Options

### Easy Customizations
- **Menu Items** - Add/remove/modify any food items
- **Pricing** - Update to your local pricing structure
- **Currency** - Change to any currency worldwide
- **Business Hours** - Modify operating hours
- **Delivery Areas** - Add location restrictions
- **Payment Methods** - Update payment information

### Advanced Customizations
- **Multiple Locations** - Add location selection logic
- **Inventory Management** - Add stock tracking
- **Promotional Codes** - Implement discount systems
- **Multi-language** - Add language detection and responses
- **SMS Integration** - Add SMS notifications
- **Email Receipts** - Integrate email confirmation

## üì± Customer Experience Flow
1. Customer starts chat with bot
2. Bot greets and shows menu
3. Customer places order
4. Bot confirms order and total
5. Customer provides delivery details
6. Customer sends payment screenshot
7. Admin approves/declines payment
8. Customer receives confirmation with delivery time
9. Order is tracked in Google Sheets

## üõ°Ô∏è Security Features
- Human payment verification
- Chat ID tracking for user identification
- Timestamped order logging
- Payment screenshot archival
- Admin approval controls

## üéØ Perfect For
- Restaurants
- Food trucks
- Catering services
- Bakeries
- Coffee shops
- Grocery delivery
- Meal prep services
- Any food-related business

## üÜò Support Notes
- This template requires basic n8n knowledge for setup
- Google Sheets API setup required
- Telegram Bot creation required
- Customization may require some technical skills

## üìà Scalability
- Handles multiple concurrent customers
- Conversation memory per customer
- Unlimited order volume
- Easy to add new menu items
- Expandable with additional features
